title: I'm not lev 3.. I cannot even create a bug report. lol
body: I'm lev 19 or 20. why do you indicate my acct as lev 3?

replies.body: It looks like your boards profile was having a hard time syncing up with your Summoner level. I looked into your account, and you should be good now! You're now showing up as level 19 on the boards.

Your boards account has to sync up with your in-game account by making a post on boards.
It shows you as lvl 19 to me right now so you should be good to go.
